entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:58 a.m. PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 8:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 40 km
Humidity: 37 %

Wind: NNE 3 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
